titles.title: A bill to create a safe harbor for insurers engaging in the business of insurance in connection with a cannabis-related business, and for other purposes.
A bill to create a safe harbor for insurers engaging in the business of insurance in connection with a cannabis-related business, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
